thread.title: David Weitzel
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by David Weitzel

author: David Weitzel
title: David Weitzel
text: The first time I sought the services of CR Vacations I was a bit unsettled about planning such a major vacation through an online service. But that all ended when we took the trip and enjoyed the superior service and total competence of CR Vacations employees. Particularly, Robin Sabine is an agent you can bet will tailor your vacation to your needs. Now several years later, we are returning soon to Costa Rica with Robin at the helm of our travel plans. We wouldn't use anyone else!!
